name: My Path
description:
My Path brings you the story of a world facing a crisis!

You will play as a young and skilled researcher called Anna, who has to decide how she is going to help in the fight against a mysterious desease that claimed coutless victims and left others in a confused and violent state.

To find a solution for this crisis, two groups were organized: The Field Unit and The Research Centers. While one is dealing with the people that got infected, the other is searching for a cure!

The Field Unit was created to deal with the infected who got out of control and now treathens the safety of others. Created by soldiers and researchers, this group aims to protect the cities and keep people safe. If you decide to join the Field Unity, you will use all your abilities to collect samples from the infected and help the soldiers. Be prepared to spend weeks in a camp settled near a forest!

If you decide to follow this route you will meet Kalian, the Master of the Field Unit.

The Research Centers, organized with scholars and alchemists, have the responsibility to find a cure and end this crisis once and for all. Each Center also offers support to the Field Unity, by producing and shipping medical supplies for the soldiers. If you decide to join the Research Centers, you will use all your abilities to assist with studies to find a cure and help with the supplies production. Be prepared for long hours in the library and lab work!

If you decide to follow this route you will meet Albion, the Master of one of the Reaserch Centers.

- 40K+ Words 

- 6 CGS 

-1 Good Ending and 1 Bad Ending on each route 

- Game is availabe in English and Brazilian Portuguese
